source.title: Making Working Memory Work: A Computational Model of Learning in the Prefrontal Cortex and Basal Ganglia

confidence_rationale: Computational evidence supports separable gating channels for cognitive state updates via basal ganglia-prefrontal interaction, consistent with multi-loop gate decomposition in REE.

mapping.source_claim_statement: Basal ganglia gating policies can selectively update prefrontal representations rather than globally opening all channels.
mapping.ree_translation: Supports REE tri-loop/stream-selective commitment gating and the need for explicit arbitration policy over separate gate manifolds.
mapping.mapping_caveat: Primary focus is cognitive working-memory gating; motor/motivational channels are not fully symmetric in this model.
mapping.source_context: Biologically grounded computational model of prefrontal-basal ganglia interaction.

confidence_components.notes: Strong mechanistic model relevance with moderate transfer abstraction for full tri-loop extension.
